name: Croc Word: Crossword Puzzle
description:
Croc Word: Challenging and entertaining Crossword Puzzle for everyone!

Help Professor of Words Science Ph.D. Croc solve colorful crosswords!
Search words by swiping or clicking, build words from a combination of letters! Earn coins for solving Crossword Puzzle, use clues to find crossword answers!

Workout your brain in our addicting word puzzle game with hundreds of challenging levels.

+ Warning! The gameplay is very addicting!

+ Guess all the hidden words using provided letters. Can you solve all the puzzles?

+ Extra words will give you bonus gold!

+ Your friends will make your daily prize even bigger!

+ Ask your friends for help!

Have fun playing Croc Word with your family and friends, suitable for all ages!
